ModMetaData.name: Hooligan Faction
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a faction of hooligans to the game who are permanently hostile and always suffering from one or more addictions. They like to fight with beer bottles and wood logs, swarming their enemies with sheer numbers.
Inspired by a conversation on the official RimWorld Discord server (see preview image).
